item.title: Updates Digest for October 4, 2025
item.dc:creator: FitGirl
item.description:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday. All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages. All Update Digests, sorted by date âž§âž§âž§

The post Updates Digest for October 4, 2025 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
item.content:encoded:
Updates for the following games have been added today/yesterday.

All updates can be found on their own page: Updates List in the menus on the top and on the left. All links to updates are also posted on respective game pages.

Baldur's Gate 3
Repack page

  1. Baldurs.Gate.3.Update.v4.1.1.6848561-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)
    +
    Baldurs.Gate.3.Language.Pack.v4.1.1.6848561-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

  2. Baldurs.Gate.3.Update.v4.1.1.6931813-RUNE (3 parts) (Source: scene)
    +
    Baldurs.Gate.3.Language.Pack.v4.1.1.6931813-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

or

  1. Baldurs_Gate_3_Update_from_v6758295_to_v6897358-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
  2. Baldurs_Gate_3_Update_from_v6897358_to_v6931813-ElAmigos (3 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)

and then
new! Baldurs_Gate_3_Update_from_v6931813_to_v6946847-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

Cities: Skylines II
Repack page

  1. Cities_Skylines_II_Update_from_v1.2.5.F1_to_v1.3.3.F1-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
    or
    Cities.Skylines.II.Leisure.and.Legacy.Update.v1.3.3f1-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

  2. new! Cities_Skylines_II_Update_from_v1.3.3.F1_to_v1.3.5.F1-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
Deadzone: Rogue
Repack page
Deadzone_Rogue_Update_from_v1.0.0.9_to_v1.0.0.18-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
or
new! Deadzone.Rogue.Update.v1.0.0.19-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)
Forza Horizon 5
Repack page

  1. Unpack to the installed game folder and run Patch.bat.
    FH5_Update_from_v1.656.386.0_to_v1.663.817.0-FitGirl (2 parts)

  2. Forza.Horizon.5.Update.v1.671.65.0-RUNE (4 parts) (Source: scene)

and then

  1. FH5_Update_from_v1.671.65.0_to_v1.676.313.0-ElAmigos (2 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)
  2. FH5_Update_from_v1.676.313_to_v1.681.440.0-ElAmigos (2 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)
  3. FH5_Update_from_v1.681.440_to_v1.683.258-ElAmigos (2 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)
  4. FH5_Update_from_v1.683.258_to_v1.685.421-ElAmigos (2 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)

or

  1. Forza.Horizon.5.Update.v1.676.313.0-RUNE (4 parts) (Source: scene)
  2. Forza.Horizon.5.Update.v1.683.258.0.incl.DLC-RUNE (4 parts) (Source: scene)
  3. Forza.Horizon.5.Update.v1.685.421.0-RUNE (2 parts) (Source: scene)

and then
new! FH5_Update_from_v1.685.421_to_v1.687.302-ElAmigos (2 parts) (Source: ElAmigos)

Hades II
Repack page
new! Hades_II_Update_from_v1.131346_to_v1.131641-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
HUMANKIND
Repack page

  1. HUMANKIND.Cultures.of.Oceania.Update.v1.0.26.4437-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)
  2. HUMANKIND.Cultures.of.Oceania.Update.v1.0.27.4539-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

and then

  1. HUMANKIND.Cultures.of.Oceania.Update.v1.0.28.4623-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)
  2. HUMANKIND.Cultures.of.Oceania.Update.v1.0.28.4665-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

or

  1. Humankind_Update_from_v1.0.27.4539_to_v1.0.28.4612-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)
  2. Humankind_Update_from_v1.0.28.4612_to_v1.0.28.4665-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

and then
new! Humankind_Update_from_v1.0.28.4665_to_v1.0.29.4704-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

Paranormal Cleanup

  1. Paranormal.Cleanup.Update.v1.2.0-TENOKE (2 parts) (Source: scene)

Sker Ritual

S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Legends of the Zone Trilogy - Enhanced Edition

  1. STALKER_Trilogy_Enhanced_Edition_Update_v1.0.1-1.7.1.13483-ElAmigos.rar (Source: ElAmigos)

or

and then

or
new! STALKER.Trilogy.EE.v1.3.1-RUNE.rar (Source: scene)

All Update Digests, sorted by date âž§âž§âž§

item.title: Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators
item.dc:creator: FitGirl
item.description:
#6192 Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators Genres/Tags: Arcade, Jump and run, Third-person, 3D Companies: Nintendo, Nintendo EAD Languages: ENG/MULTI11 Original Size: 7 GB Repack Size: 4.2 GB Download Mirrors (Direct Links) Filehoster: DataNodes (Speed & Usability) [Use IDM] Filehoster: FuckingFast (REALLY Fucking Fast ðŸ™‚ ) Filehoster: MultiUpload … Continue reading Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators →

The post Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
item.content:encoded:
#6192 Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Jump and run, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Nintendo, Nintendo EAD
Languages: ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 7 GB
Repack Size: 4.2 GB

Download Mirrors (Direct Links)

  • Filehoster: DataNodes (Speed & Usability) [Use IDM]
    Click to show direct links
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part01.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part02.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part03.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part04.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part05.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part06.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part07.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part08.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part09.rar
  • Filehoster: FuckingFast (REALLY Fucking Fast )
    Click to show direct links
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part01.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part02.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part03.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part04.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part05.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part06.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part07.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part08.rar
    Super_Mario_Galaxy_1_and_2_–_fitgirl-repacks.site_–_.part09.rar

  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Download Mirrors (Torrent)

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on two scene Switch releases: Super_Mario_Galaxy_NSW-VENOM (3.7 GB) & Super_Mario_Galaxy_2_NSW-VENOM (2.8 GB)
  • Games version: v1.2.0
  • Ryujinx (v1.3.2, June 10, 2025, 32 MB), Citron (v0.7.1, October 3, 2025, 31 MB), Eden (v0.0.3, September 4, 2025, 28 MB), Sudachi (v1.0.15, March 25, 2025, 22 MB) and Torzu (Initial Build, November 19, 2024, 85 MB) Switch emulators are included and preconfigured
  • Switch Firmware v20.3.0 (340 MB) added
  • Use the included custom launcher to test all five emus and use the one which performs better on your system
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed for better repack size
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 7 to 4.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in emulators’ settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Bypassing softlock on the 1st cutscene of SMG1

On most systems ALL emulators may give you a softlock or emulator crash right before or right after the first cutscene. There are different yet unstable ways to bypass it, so for simplicity I’ve included the save file right after that cutscene. So you may start the game as usual, play until you softlock, quit it and replace the save with the one I’ve included and continue from it.

Copy “GameData.bin” from “_Save post-cutscene” folder to:

for Ryujinx:

Right mouse button on the game title, “Open User Save Directory”, copy “GameData.bin” to “MarioGalaxy” folder, replacing the existing one.

for all Yuzu forks:

Right mouse button on the game title, “Open Save Data Location”, copy “GameData.bin” to “MarioGalaxy” folder, replacing the existing one.

Game Description
Save the galaxy from Bowser and his minions in the original planet-hopping adventure!
Bowser has attacked the Star Festival, abducted Princess Peach, and put the whole galaxy in danger! Join up with Rosalina and the Lumas, protectors of the cosmos, to restore the Comet Observatory and rescue the princess in the Super Mario Galaxy game. Use power-ups like the Bee Mushroom to fly, the Boo Mushroom to float and move through certain types of barriers, and more on your journey to reclaim the Power Stars!

Travel aboard Starship Mario to save the galaxy againâ€¦this time with Yoshi’s help!
Bowser is at it again, but this time Mario has a little extra help in recovering the Power Stars. Join Lubba aboard Starship Mario for the duration of your journey, and team up with Yoshi to enhance your planet-hopping moves in the Super Mario Galaxy. 2 game. With Yoshi by your side, you can jump higher and furtherâ€”and you can even attack foes using his tongue! Yoshi has his own power-ups too, like the Dash Pepper and the Blimp Fruit, which allow him to sprint super quickly, float Mario high into the air, and more.

Journey through space in two classic adventures featuring Mario, now improved for the Nintendo Switch system.

Travel the stars with enhanced resolution, improved UI, and additional content.

Learn more about the Lumas from additional Storybook chapters, groove to a bit of additional music.

Get additional Health and fall recovery in Assist Mode.

Join Rosalina and the Lumas to restore the Comet Observatory and rescue Princess Peach in Super Mario Galaxy.

Travel aboard Starship Mario and join up with Yoshi to save the cosmos again in Super Mario Galaxy 2.

The post Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2, v1.2.0 + 5 Switch Emulators appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Repack Features

  • Based on Lost.Records.Bloom.and.Rage.v2.04.132116-RUNE ISO release: rune-lost.records.bloom.and.rage.v2.04.132116.iso (42,165,075,968 bytes)
  • Game version: v2.04.132116; Tape 1 & 2 stories are included
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Bonus OST in WAV format ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of bonus OST in MP3 format
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 39.3 to 27.2/27.3 GB)
  • Installation takes from 45 minutes (on 16-threads CPU) up to 1.5 hours (on 8-threads CPU)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 41.8 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Rewind back to the 90s and live the defining summer of four high school girls as they forge bonds through their growing friendship, their punk band, and an unexplained event that will forever change their lives.

What really happened that summer?

Game Features

  • A 27-YEAR PROMISE – Navigate between dual timelines and shape both narratives â€“ in 1995 and 2022 â€“ with each offering a piece of the larger puzzle: the life-changing secrets they uncovered back then and why theyâ€™re reuniting now, after all these years. Together, in this place, theyâ€™re forced to try and remember clearly the fateful memories that have eluded them for the past 27 years.
  • CAPTURE & CONNECT – Connect with your newfound sisterhood through lifelike interactions and conversations that feel real: engage in immersive dialogue that changes based on where you look and what you say; where you can do things like interrupt and ignore. Grab your camcorder and explore, filming Velvet Cove and capturing the essence of its people, places, and lush nature. Film just for the fun of it or try to find the dark secrets tucked away.
  • GIRLS TO THE FRONT – Play as Swann and get to know your new friends, each with their own lives and battles. Come out of your shell and embrace rebellion over the summer as you form friendships with Nora, Autumn, and Kat. Through your actions and words, youâ€™ll shape your relationships with each of them on your journey to self-discovery. Will your bond wither over the years or will it feel like you were barely separated at all?
  • A NOSTALGIC DREAMSCAPE – In a picturesque corner of Michigan in 1995 lies the seemingly sleepy little town of Velvet Cove. Between dense woodlands and serene lakes, itâ€™s a place where beauty meets the bizarre. Cloaked in a carefully crafted dreampop soundtrack that blends nostalgia and ethereal vibes, youâ€™ll definitely find it all nice and relaxing…

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous LR repacks.

The post Lost Records: Bloom & Rage – Soundtrack Edition, v2.04.132116 (Tapes 1 & 2) + Bonus OST appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Repack Features

  • Based on Castle_of_Heart_Retold-Razor1911 ISO release: rzr-casteofheartretold.iso (4,126,703,616 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.3
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.8 to 2.5 GB)
  • Installation takes 1-3 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8.2 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Stand against the Sorcerer – a servant of the evil god Chernobog – to free the last priestess of goddess Mokosh and liberate the land from the Sorcerer’s tyrannical rule. As a Slavic warrior named Svaran, you must overcome not only magical creatures and lethal contraptions, but also a terrible curse that has turned your body to stone. You need to keep up your killing spree, otherwise your body will start to disintegrate, eventually losing limbs and the ability to wield weapons!

Castle of Heart: Retold is a massively upgraded and expanded version of the original release, featuring significant enhancements across gameplay, story, visuals, and much more.

Game Features

  • CHALLENGE WORTHY OF A KNIGHT – Travel across four distinct Slavic landscapes and prove your worth against the Sorcerer’s minions and blood-thirsty mythological creatures, such as chorts, ghouls, and vodniks. Master your swordsmanship and tip the chances in your favor with dozens of melee and ranged weapons: from torches and hatchets to javelins and crossbows. Put your skills and reflexes to the ultimate challenge in demanding boss battles against powerful and intimidating foes.
  • REMADE. REFINED. RETOLD. – Experience the definitive version of Castle of Heart, boasting a legendary number of improvements. Immerse yourself in the medieval world made more beautiful thanks to new animations and character models, improved lighting, remixed music, and more detailed environment. Enjoy the massively enhanced gameplay with rebalanced combat and platforming systems, vastly improved user interface, and more responsive controls. With any distractions out of the way, wow everything boils down to your skills and tactics!
  • AN OLD SLAVIC LEGEND – Discover an untold legend of Svaran and Mira who dared defy the will of the powerful Sorcerer and found themselves amongst the battle of good and evil. In Castle of Heart: Retold, every line of dialogue has been rewritten and every cutscene has been remade. Challenge yourself to collect all the crystals of Mokosh and unlock fully reimagined endings to the story!

The post Castle of Heart: Retold – v1.0.3 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on The.Troop.Late.War-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-the.troop.late.war.iso (10,709,301,248 bytes)
  • Game version: Build 20250929; 2 DLCs (US Forces & Late War) DLCs are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10 to 3.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-10 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 10 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
On the morning of the 6th June 1944 the Western Allies began the largest seaborne invasion in the history of warfare. D-Day would mark the start of a vicious campaign to wrestle North West Europe from German control. The following months would see the ancient fields, farms and villages serve as a battleground for new, lethal weapons that would become legendary.

The Troop follows the campaign of British and Canadian forces as they face the German Heer and SS in Normandy. Take command of infantry, motorised and armoured units in desperate tactical turn-based combat against an AI opponent that is challenging and unpredictable, but fair and fallible.

Simple, complete control – The Troop embraces the best traditions of classic tabletop war gaming combined with the interactivity and excitement the digital format affords. You have complete control over your units’ actions; tanks will not expose their weak side armour with unexpected pathing, hidden guns will not reveal their positions by firing prematurely, infantry will not flee inexplicably when victory is a few heroic paces away. You are free to take your time… but any mistakes are yours and yours alone.

Game Features

  • Your AI opponent has no special knowledge and is subject to all the same rules and restrictions as you. The enemy has no fixed plan and will vary deployment and tactics with each replay.
  • Follow the narrative of the campaign from D-Day, playing as a range of different units (Commonwealth and German) in different situations as history plays out across Normandy.
  • Choose your scenario, choose your side, choose your force, set your enemy restrictions… Play. What will the enemy bring to the fight and what tactics will they use? You’ll have to wait and see, but it will not be the same as last time! Endless replayability.
  • Our first campaign is now live! Based on the exploits of the 8th Armoured Brigade as they battle the forces of the Panzer Lehr and SS, take command of a British battlegroup of persistent units that gain experience as the campaign progresses. More campaigns are on their way in the near future!
  • Choose your difficulty, play as you want – The Troop does not have one difficulty setting. Instead players can control a variety of features, rules and information settings to tailor their gameplay experience for the most enjoyable challenge.
  • A game, not a simulation – The Troop is born from a life long passion for WW2 history and turn-based games. Our aim is to give a little glimpse of that history through an enjoyable challenge. The events depicted are set in the broad reality of the historical campaigns, the missions themselves however are fictional and geared towards an enjoyable challenge rather than a strict depiction of history. We hope only to do justice to the spirit of those countless memoirs and after action reports that survive and continue to fascinate us.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous TT repacks.

The post The Troop – Build 20250929 + 2 DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Rose.Of.Wind-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-rose.of.wind.iso (5,662,580,736 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of menu/intro videos in original quality with insane butrate. By default only recoded versions of those files are included
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 5.3 to 2.5/3.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-4 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 5.1 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
Welcome to Rose Of Wind – a medieval tavern management simulator where you are tasked with reviving a legendary establishment and restoring its former glory! After your grandfather’s passing, the tavern remained abandoned for a long time, and now it’s time to fill it with life, warmth, and atmosphere once again.

Explore the medieval world, manage every aspect of the tavern, and create a place that attracts both locals and travelers from around the world. Can you restore your tavern’s former glory and become a legend among adventurers, merchants, and travelers?

Who knows what secrets the old tavern holds? Can you uncover them all? Explore the stylized medieval world, manage every aspect of the establishment, and create a place where both locals and wandering souls will gather. Restore Rose Of Wind to its legendary glory and become part of a new story!

Game Features

  • Serve Visitors – Each visitor brings a new story. Treat them to delicious food, offer a warm bed, engage in conversation, or simply provide a cozy corner for rest.
  • Prepare Dishes – Develop your kitchen, discover new recipes for dishes and drinks, and enhance them with unique ingredients. Create exquisite meals that will become the hallmark of your tavern.
  • Brew Beverages – Brew alcoholic drinks, create unique cocktails and elixirs that will delight your guests. A new recipe means new opportunities to attract customers.
  • Resource Delivery – In the tavern’s basement lies a peculiar place – a riverside dock where you receive supplies. Through it, you order everything you need: ingredients, wax for lighting the halls, coal for stoves and the distillery, as well as tools to repair furniture that guests might damage – accidentally or intentionally.
  • Hotel – Develop the inn within the tavern. Add new rooms, upgrade them, and monitor their condition. A cozy lodging becomes another source of income and unique events.
  • Decor – Create a unique atmosphere in the tavern by changing its exterior and interior. Make your tavern truly memorable – a cozy home for all.
  • Airship – An airship regularly flies over the city, announcing events from the outside world: holidays, weather changes, and other news that can influence visitor behavior and mood. Listen carefully – these signals will help you prepare in advance!

The post Rose of Wind appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on Easy.Red.2.v1.6.0-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-easy.red.2.v1.6.0.iso (16,806,709,248 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.6.0; 4 DLCs (Stalingrad, Normandy, Ardennes 1940 & 1944 and Shanghai – Nanking) are included and activated
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 15.7 to 5 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-6 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 15.7 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
Game Description
Easy Red 2 is the game for those who know just what they want from a World War 2 shooter: simulation in weapons and mechanics, historical accuracy in battles, and expansive maps leaving room for large-scale infantry and vehicle combat alike.

In this new version of Easy Red, we wrote everything from scratch to reach a quality of game mechanics and optimization to manage and graphical design that looks appealing yet also runs well on lower-end machines.

In Easy Red 2, you will be taken to both the European and Pacific fronts of the war. On the European front, you will be taken to the shores of Anzio, Italy- working your way towards the bombed peaks of Monte Cassino. You will also be taken to Kos- the Greek island invaded by the Germans in 1943. In the Pacific, you will go to Kwajalein- the Japanese-occupied island invaded by the United States Marine Corps in 1944.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous ER2 repacks.

The post Easy Red 2: All Fronts – v1.6.0 + 4 DLCs appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)



Repack Features

  • Based on UNYIELDER-TENOKE ISO release: tenoke-unyielder.iso (14,939,006,976 bytes)
  • Game version: v1.0.1
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 13.9 to 8.5 GB)
  • Installation takes 14-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13.6 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
Game Description
UNYIELDER unites Looter-Shooters, Movement FPS and Character Action Games in an infinitely expandable Roguelite to create Spectacular, Absurd and Chaotic Boss battles.

EREBUS, THE CAPITAL CITY OF ANTARCTICA, 1972 – A hotspot for apocalyptic-level events, after decades of existential torment, EREBUS finally collapsed. Towering derelicts of the once concrete utopia are buried in dunes of rust: “PNEUMA”, a by-product of entropic weapons; Man-made “Heaven”.
CARVE YOUR PATH – Journey through the war-torn lands of EREBUS, Defeat enemies, loot weapons, grow in power.
A WALKING CATACLYSM OF YOUR OWN DESIGN – Wield RUPTURE, RHAPSODY and REVERIE, volatile sources of ineffable power. Unleash your unique brand of devastation with bizarre weapons and perks.
BUILD YOUR FINAL BOSS – Scavenge the data of slain enemies and build your own Pattern of machine-god punching bag. Unique combinations alter the boss fight.

Game Features

  • BREAK THE GAME: Like any good toy, play with it vigorously, experiment. (and have fun)
  • EMBODY TENACITY: The further you go, the more dangerous the world becomes. (but so do you)
  • DOMINATION: Gather unique weapons and perks to empower your build and playstyle. (or just pick the weird stuff, who’s going to stop you?)
  • BYOBoss: With parts from enemies you defeat, customize the Final Boss.

The post UNYIELDER – v1.0.1 appeared first on FitGirl Repacks.
